collection_holder_name: WNYC New York Public Radio Archive
pageContext.collection_description: Numerous programs, but not as extensive as that of WNYC.
pageContext.collection_extent: 12 laquer discs; 1229 broadcast wave files; 866 1/4 inch audio tape; 363 CDs; 68 DATs; 1 shellac disc
collectionFormats: Digital audio file (including MP3, WAV, AIFF, etc.)
Optical disc (Including CD, CD-R, CD-RW, DVD, DVD-R, DVD-RW, VCD)
pageContext.collection_notes: Archive for QXR dates to 1937.  Much of the material is on tape.
